mapper.select: select * from LPC_PRINTSHEET where PK_ORDER_B = #{pkOrderB} And SUPPLOTNUM=#{suppLotnum}
mapper.insert:
insert into LPC_PRINTSHEET (PK_ORDER,PK_ORDER_B,SUPPCODE,SUPPNAME,SUPPSHORTNAME,SUPPMATERCODE,SUPPLOTNUM,VBILLCODE,MATERCODE,MATERNAME,
MATERMATERIALSPEC,
MATERMATERIALTYPE,
PRODUCEDATE,NETWEIGHT,GROSSWEIGHT,NUM,PRINT,DBILLDATE) values (#{PK_ORDER},#{PK_ORDER_B},#{SUPPCODE},#{SUPPNAME},#{SUPPSHORTNAME},#{SUPPMATERCODE},#{SUPPLOTNUM},#{VBILLCODE},#{MATERCODE},#{MATERNAME},
#{MATERMATERIALSPEC},
#{MATERMATERIALTYPE},
#{PRODUCEDATE},#{NETWEIGHT},#{GROSSWEIGHT},#{NUM},#{PRINT},#{DBILLDATE})
mapper.select:
select * from (
select ROWNUM r,p.* from (select l.PK_ORDER,l.PK_ORDER_B,l.VBILLCODE, l.MATERCODE,l.MATERNAME, l.MATERMATERIALSPEC,l.MATERMATERIALTYPE,l.NUM,l.DBILLDATE, l.SUPPLOTNUM,l.SUPPCODE,l.SUPPNAME, l.SUPPSHORTNAME,l.SUPPMATERCODE,l.NETWEIGHT,l.GROSSWEIGHT,l.PRODUCEDATE from LPC_PRINTSHEET l
and l.SUPPCODE = #{SUPPCODE}
and l.SUPPMATERCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPMATERCODE}),'%')
and l.SUPPLOTNUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPLOTNUM}),'%')
and l.VBILLCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{VBILLCODE}),'%')
and TO_DATE(l.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= TO_DATE(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_DATE(l.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') < TO_DATE(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and l.PRINT = 0
and l.PRINT = 1
Order by l.DBILLDATE ) p
) WHERE r BETWEEN (#{current}-1)*(#{pageSize})+1 AND (#{current}*#{pageSize})

select * from (
select ROWNUM r,p.* from
(select c.PK_ORDER,c.PK_ORDER_B,c.VBILLCODE, c.MATERCODE,c.MATERNAME, c.MATERMATERIALSPEC,c.MATERMATERIALTYPE,c.NUM,decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE) DBILLDATE,c.SUPPNAME SUPPNAME, l.SUPPLOTNUM,c.SUPPCODE, (select SHORTNAME from ncc.view_xinya_bd_supplier@DBLIK_PURCHASE d WHERE d.CODE=c.SUPPCODE and rownum=1) SUPPSHORTNAME, l.SUPPMATERCODE,l.NETWEIGHT,l.GROSSWEIGHT,l.PRODUCEDATE from (select a.PK_ORDER PK_ORDER,b.PK_ORDER_B PK_ORDER_B,a.VBILLCODE VBILLCODE,b.MATERCODE MATERCODE, b.MATERNAME MATERNAME,b.MATERMATERIALSPEC MATERMATERIALSPEC, b.MATERMATERIALTYPE MATERMATERIALTYPE,b.NUM NUM,a.DBILLDATE DBILLDATE,a.SUPPNAME SUPPNAME,a.SUPPCODE SUPPCODE from ncc.view_xinya_po_order@DBLIK_PURCHASE a join ncc.view_xinya_po_order_b@DBLIK_PURCHASE b on a.PK_ORDER = b.PK_ORDER) c left outer join LPC_PRINTSHEET l ON c.PK_ORDER_B=l.PK_ORDER_B
l.PK_ORDER is null
and c.SUPPCODE = #{SUPPCODE}
and SUPPMATERCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPMATERCODE}),'%')
and SUPPLOTNUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPLOTNUM}),'%')
and c.VBILLCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{VBILLCODE}),'%')
and TO_DATE(c.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')>= TO_DATE(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_DATE(c.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and PRINT = 0
Order by c.DBILLDATE desc ) p
) WHERE r BETWEEN (#{current}-1)*(#{pageSize})+1 AND (#{current}*#{pageSize})

select * from ( select ROWNUM r,p.* from
(select decode(c.PK_ORDER, null, l.PK_ORDER, c.PK_ORDER) PK_ORDER,decode(c.PK_ORDER_B, null, l.PK_ORDER_B, c.PK_ORDER_B) PK_ORDER_B, decode(c.VBILLCODE, null, l.VBILLCODE, c.VBILLCODE) VBILLCODE,decode(c.MATERCODE, null, l.MATERCODE, c.MATERCODE) MATERCODE, decode(c.MATERNAME, null, l.MATERNAME, c.MATERNAME) MATERNAME,decode(c.MATERMATERIALSPEC, null, l.MATERMATERIALSPEC, c.MATERMATERIALSPEC) MATERMATERIALSPEC, decode(c.MATERMATERIALTYPE, null, l.MATERMATERIALTYPE, c.MATERMATERIALTYPE) MATERMATERIALTYPE,decode(c.NUM, null, l.NUM, c.NUM) NUM, decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE) DBILLDATE,decode(c.SUPPNAME, null, l.SUPPNAME, c.SUPPNAME) SUPPNAME, l.SUPPLOTNUM,decode(c.SUPPCODE, null, l.SUPPCODE, c.SUPPCODE) SUPPCODE, (select SHORTNAME from ncc.view_xinya_bd_supplier@DBLIK_PURCHASE d WHERE d.CODE=decode(c.SUPPCODE, null, l.SUPPCODE, c.SUPPCODE) and rownum=1) SUPPSHORTNAME, l.SUPPMATERCODE,l.NETWEIGHT,l.GROSSWEIGHT,l.PRODUCEDATE from (select a.PK_ORDER PK_ORDER,b.PK_ORDER_B PK_ORDER_B,a.VBILLCODE VBILLCODE,b.MATERCODE MATERCODE, b.MATERNAME MATERNAME,b.MATERMATERIALSPEC MATERMATERIALSPEC, b.MATERMATERIALTYPE MATERMATERIALTYPE,b.NUM NUM,a.DBILLDATE DBILLDATE,a.SUPPNAME SUPPNAME,a.SUPPCODE SUPPCODE from ncc.view_xinya_po_order@DBLIK_PURCHASE a join ncc.view_xinya_po_order_b@DBLIK_PURCHASE b on a.PK_ORDER = b.PK_ORDER) c full outer join LPC_PRINTSHEET l ON c.PK_ORDER_B=l.PK_ORDER_B
and decode(c.SUPPCODE, null, l.SUPPCODE, c.SUPPCODE) = #{SUPPCODE}
and l.SUPPMATERCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPMATERCODE}),'%')
and l.SUPPLOTNUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPLOTNUM}),'%')
and decode(c.VBILLCODE, null, l.VBILLCODE, c.VBILLCODE) like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{VBILLCODE}),'%')
and TO_DATE(decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE),'yyyy-MM-dd')>= TO_DATE(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_DATE(decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and PRINT = 0
Order by decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE) desc ) p
) WHERE r BETWEEN (#{current}-1)*(#{pageSize})+1 AND (#{current}*#{pageSize})

select count(*) from (select a.PK_ORDER PK_ORDER,b.PK_ORDER_B PK_ORDER_B,a.VBILLCODE VBILLCODE,b.MATERCODE MATERCODE, b.MATERNAME MATERNAME,b.MATERMATERIALSPEC MATERMATERIALSPEC, b.MATERMATERIALTYPE MATERMATERIALTYPE,b.NUM NUM,a.DBILLDATE DBILLDATE,a.SUPPNAME SUPPNAME,a.SUPPCODE SUPPCODE from ncc.view_xinya_po_order@DBLIK_PURCHASE a join ncc.view_xinya_po_order_b@DBLIK_PURCHASE b on a.PK_ORDER = b.PK_ORDER) c right outer join LPC_PRINTSHEET l ON c.PK_ORDER_B=l.PK_ORDER_B
and l.SUPPCODE = #{SUPPCODE}
and l.SUPPMATERCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPMATERCODE}),'%')
and l.SUPPLOTNUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPLOTNUM}),'%')
and l.VBILLCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{VBILLCODE}),'%')
and TO_DATE(decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') >= TO_DATE(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_DATE(decode(c.DBILLDATE, null, l.DBILLDATE, c.DBILLDATE),'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and l.PRINT = 0
and l.PRINT = 1

select count((select SHORTNAME from ncc.view_xinya_bd_supplier@DBLIK_PURCHASE d WHERE d.CODE=c.SUPPCODE and rownum < 2)) from (select b.PK_ORDER_B PK_ORDER_B,a.VBILLCODE VBILLCODE,b.MATERCODE MATERCODE, b.MATERNAME MATERNAME,b.MATERMATERIALSPEC MATERMATERIALSPEC, b.MATERMATERIALTYPE MATERMATERIALTYPE,a.DBILLDATE DBILLDATE,a.SUPPNAME SUPPNAME,a.SUPPCODE SUPPCODE from ncc.view_xinya_po_order@DBLIK_PURCHASE a join ncc.view_xinya_po_order_b@DBLIK_PURCHASE b on a.PK_ORDER = b.PK_ORDER) c left outer join LPC_PRINTSHEET l ON c.PK_ORDER_B=l.PK_ORDER_B
l.PK_ORDER is null
and c.SUPPCODE = #{SUPPCODE}
and SUPPMATERCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPMATERCODE}),'%')
and SUPPLOTNUM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{SUPPLOTNUM}),'%')
and c.VBILLCODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{VBILLCODE}),'%')
and TO_DATE(c.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')>= TO_DATE(#{STARTDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_DATE(c.DBILLDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(#{ENDDATE},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and PRINT = 0
mapper.update: update LPC_PRINTSHEET set PRINT = 0 where PK_ORDER_B=#{PK_ORDER_B}
